extendedInfo.description: "Experience the next generation of visual Grocery/Recipe List creation today!" Now with voice control and product rename capabilities! Visual list creation:No more typing (and retyping) of product names you purchase repeatedly; simply tap the icon to indicate the number of that particular product you wish to purchase.Over 170 predefined products:Create your list using existing product icons or create new products (with default icons) to add to your database for future selection.Ability to add new products with ease:Is the item you're adding unique?  No problem, add it once and use it multiple times.Fast sorting & searching through products:Searching and sorting products has never been easier!  Sort modes include: Sort by Popularity and Sort by Name.  Search dynamically displays desired products as you type.List sharing:Share your lists and favorite recipes via email with family and friends anytime.As you shop:Tap products in your list to indicate items have been purchased.  Then, elect to view or hide purchased items.

reviews.title: good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Well, I liked the interface about looking at the pictures of various items, tap to add quantities, that is pleasing. But, this program lacks some UI logic flow. Most important thing I should mention that, I can add my custom product and delete the custom product. But I cannot delete any built in products that came with the program. For example, I never buy dog food as I dont have dog. It would be nice if I could delete that product from the database so that it will be quicker for me to pick the items that I buy often.  The button \"Finish Shopping Later\" is confusing. It should give option directly to , \"Save The list\", \"Delete List\", \"Mark as Completed\", \"Reset List as UnComplete\". Although I can do all of these tasks by tweaking the options. I would say, this interface should be changed.   By the way, if custom product deletion feature is added in the future, I would say, there should be another option to reset database too. That will make the logic balanced.  A feature request : What about letting the user add own icon for the custom product. That will be super comfortable to build the list quickly.  Other than these 2 points, I would have given 5 Stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Would be great if items could have aisle associated to them, and maybe be able to be sorted by that. I like being able to choose items by large icons. Nice app.
